messages.subject: Re: Need game suggestions
messages.msgSnippet: Runescape online with it s medieval settings provides lots of places to explore. Your character can also mine and smelt your own metal, harvest food, mill
messages.messageBody:
Runescape online with it's medieval settings provides lots of places
to explore. Your character can also mine and smelt your own metal,
harvest food, mill flour, selling and barter trade your items.

Roblox.com is lego games and building online.

Any of the Lego games - Star Wars, Indiana Jones

Sim city

SharonBugs

messages.subject: Re: Need game suggestions
messages.msgSnippet: ... favorites ... He ... suggestions? ... There is some fighting involved but DD, 9, and I are really enjoying Spore.  She also likes Age of Mythology. K
messages.messageBody:
--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, "carnationsgalore"
<addled.homemaker@...> wrote:
>
> Jeffrey (12) loves playing PS2 and PS3 games. His current
favorites
> are:
>
> Mercenaries series
> Grand Theft Auto series
> Battlefield Bad Company
>
> He's tried World of Warcraft. He's not a big fantasy genre lover.
He
> did enjoy running his character around and exploring the areas, but
> didn't care about doing quests or fighting to gain levels.
>
> He's looking for something new and interesting to try. Any
suggestions?
>
> Beth M.
>


There is some fighting involved but DD, 9, and I are really enjoying
Spore. She also likes Age of Mythology.

K

Peace,
De

messages.subject: Need game suggestions
messages.msgSnippet: Jeffrey (12) loves playing PS2 and PS3 games.  His current favorites are: Mercenaries series Grand Theft Auto series Battlefield Bad Company He s tried World
messages.messageBody:
Jeffrey (12) loves playing PS2 and PS3 games. His current favorites
are:

Mercenaries series
Grand Theft Auto series
Battlefield Bad Company

He's tried World of Warcraft. He's not a big fantasy genre lover. He
did enjoy running his character around and exploring the areas, but
didn't care about doing quests or fighting to gain levels.

He's looking for something new and interesting to try. Any suggestions?

Beth M.
